headline: Why Charlie Munger Never Sold A Single Costco Share—The Billionaire Investor Called Himself A 'Total Addict' Of The Store
summary: Costco Wholesale Corporation (NASDAQ:COST) has built its reputation on low prices, loyal customers, and a business model that rarely wavers. In a recent interview with Chief Executive magazine, Chair Hamilton "Tony" James reflected on the late Charlie Munger's deep influence on the company. Munger, best known as Warren Buffett's longtime partner at Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK, BRK.B)), spent over 25 years on Costco's board, pushing a simple but effective message: "Stick to our knitting, our val
